songs.title: Dooron Dooron
songs.quote: Since the first time I saw you...

songs.title: Ishq Hain
songs.quote: You sweeten my life like nothing else.

songs.title: Apna Bana Le
songs.quote: I found my home in you.

songs.title: Khoobsurat
songs.quote: Every shade of you is my favorite color.

songs.title: Tumhare Hi Rahenge Hum
songs.quote: I want to drink in every moment with you.

songs.title: Jeena Laga Hoon
songs.quote: I'm falling for you, every single day.

songs.title: Aaj Se Teri
songs.quote: I see my whole world in your eyes.

songs.title: Jhol
songs.quote: You are the most beautiful thing to happen to me.

songs.title: Darkhaast
songs.quote: Every part of me belongs to you.

reasons: The way you smile at small things.
How you always know what to say.
Your laugh is my favorite sound.
You make the world feel softer.
letter: From the moment you walked into my life, everything became brighter.
Your smile is my favorite sunrise, and your laugh is my favorite song.
I promise to always be there for you, to cheer you on,
and to love you more with every passing day.

celebration.subheader: I knew you'd say yes üíñ You just made me the happiest person alive!

coupons.title: Yes Day
coupons.description: I have to say yes to everything.

coupons.title: Midnight Drive
coupons.description: Just us, music, and the road.
